body_html: @wt-huang Thank you very much for your reply. You mentioned that there will be a slight delay in reporting. What is the reason for this delay? Or how to avoid this delay. I hope to get a further answer. Because for me, train_and_evaluate is more efficient, and then evaluate after the training. Look forward to your reply.

body: @wt-huang Thank you very much for your reply. You mentioned that there will be a slight delay in reporting. What is the reason for this delay? Or how to avoid this delay. I hope to get a further answer. Because for me, train_and_evaluate is more efficient, and then evaluate after the training. Look forward to your reply.
